Class CurrentOrdersController

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizzeria.CurrentOrdersController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CurrentOrdersController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for managing the current pizza orders. Handles the addition, removal, and placement of orders, along with updating UI elements such as price breakdowns.
Author:
Nithya Konduru, Dhyanashri Raman

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller when the corresponding FXML is loaded. Sets up event listeners, initializes UI components, and populates the pizza list.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object.

    • refreshOrderList

      private void refreshOrderList()
      Refreshes the pizza list view by consolidating pizzas from both Chicago and New York lists. Also updates the pricing details.

    • updatePricing

      private void updatePricing()
      Updates the price breakdown for the current order. Calculates the subtotal, sales tax, and total price including tax.

    • loadOrderData

      void loadOrderData()
      Resets the pizza list and clears the pricing details for the current order.

    • initialize2

      private void initialize2()
      Initializes button styles and hover effects for interactive UI elements.

    • handleHomeButtonClick

      private void handleHomeButtonClick()
      Handles the click event for the home button. Loads the main page FXML and opens a new window.

    • addAllPizzas

      private void addAllPizzas()
      Adds all pizzas from Chicago and New York lists to the current order. Updates the pizza list and pricing details accordingly.

    • onClearOrderClick

      private void onClearOrderClick()
      Clears the current order, resets the pizza list, and updates pricing fields to empty.

    • onPlaceOrderClick

      private void onPlaceOrderClick()
      Places the current order by adding it to the list of placed orders. Clears the current order afterward.

    • onRemovePizzaClick

      private void onRemovePizzaClick()
      Removes the selected pizza from the current order and updates the pricing fields.

    • getUnifiedPizzaList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Pizza> getUnifiedPizzaList()
      Provides access to the unified list of pizzas for the current order. This list consolidates all pizzas added from various controllers (e.g., Chicago and New York), maintaining the order in which they were added. The unified pizza list is used throughout the application to manage the current order, including displaying pizzas, calculating totals, and clearing or placing orders.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList containing all pizzas in the current order.
